caption.p: Optical microscopic images of emulsions (×10). A Samples before spray drying; and B samples after reconstitution. FOCE-MS-10%—FOCE-based emulsion with 10% of flaxseed oil; FOCE-MS-20%—FOCE-based emulsion with 20% of flaxseed oil; MS-10%—emulsion without FOCE with 10% of flaxseed oil; MS-20%—emulsion without FOCE with 20% of flaxseed oil.
